info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:41AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Berkshire and northeastern Columbia Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1141 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Austerlitz, or 8 miles southwest of Pittsfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Lee, Lenox, New Lebanon, Becket, Austerlitz, Otis, Stockbridge, Canaan, Richmond, West Stockbridge, Washington, Tyringham, Barkerville, Glendale, Williamsville, Lenox Dale, The Center At Lenox, East Otis and Stearnsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
